scripts.init: npm i && SCRIPT='i' npm run lambdas:no-run
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces --if-present && SCRIPT='clean' npm run lambdas
scripts.deepclean: npm run deepclean --workspaces --if-present && echo 'rimraf node_modules' && rimraf node_modules && SCRIPT='deepclean' npm run lambdas
scripts.prep-lambdas: cd packages/lambdas && npm run prep-deploy && cd ../..
scripts.prep-deploy: npm run install-deps && npm run build:cloud && npm run test && npm run prep-lambdas
scripts.prep-deploy-staging: npm run install-deps && npm run build:staging && npm run test && npm run prep-lambdas
scripts.install-deps: npm ci --ignore-scripts --no-fund && SCRIPT='ci --ignore-scripts --no-fund' npm run lambdas:no-run
scripts.build: npm run build --workspaces && SCRIPT='build' npm run lambdas
scripts.build:cloud: npm run build:cloud --workspaces && SCRIPT='build:cloud' npm run lambdas
scripts.build:staging: ENV_TYPE='staging' npm run build:cloud --workspaces && SCRIPT='build:cloud' npm run lambdas
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspaces --if-present && SCRIPT='typecheck' npm run lambdas
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspaces --if-present && SCRIPT='lint' npm run lambdas
scripts.test:
if npm run test --workspaces --if-present && SCRIPT='test' npm run lambdas; then echo '
\033[1;32mTests passed\033[0m'; else echo '
\033[1;31m>>> Tests failed <<<\033[0m' && exit 1; fi
scripts.publish:alpha: npm run build && npx lerna publish --signoff-git-commit --dist-tag next
scripts.publish:alpha:ignore: npm run build && npx lerna publish --signoff-git-commit --dist-tag next --ignore-changes '**'
scripts.publish:prod: npm run build && npx lerna publish --signoff-git-commit
scripts.publish:prod:ignore: npm run build && npx lerna publish --signoff-git-commit --ignore-changes '**'
